module.name: state_definition
module.purpose:
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of state.
The state definition module identifies a type of state by specifying the criterium that shall be satisified for something to be in a state of that type. A state definition that is defined by the presence of an identified fault in a product.

inscope.li: definition of what is needed for a state definition to exist
relationship between two or more state definitions
relationship between a state definition and the product, activity, people or organization that it affects

outscope.li: behaviour or history of product data capable of having state
